title: Installation issue: openfoam-org 7 request for member 'rdbuf' in '((STLASCIILexer*)this)
body:
Hi,
I am trying to install `openfoam-org`, but I got the following error:
```
/mnt/resource/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-openfoam-org-7-przwv3ihfnjzn67pqj3t5b44ux6c6qao/OpenFOAM-7/platforms/linux64GccDPInt32RpathOpt/src/surfMesh/surf
aceFormats/stl/STLsurfaceFormatASCII.L.C: In member function 'int STLASCIILexer::lex()':
/mnt/resource/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-openfoam-org-7-przwv3ihfnjzn67pqj3t5b44ux6c6qao/OpenFOAM-7/platforms/linux64GccDPInt32RpathOpt/src/surfMesh/surf
aceFormats/stl/STLsurfaceFormatASCII.L.C:5474:9: error: request for member 'rdbuf' in '((STLASCIILexer*)this)->STLASCIILexer::<anonymous>.yyFlexLexer::yyin
', which is of pointer type 'std::istream*' {aka 'std::basic_istream<char>*'} (maybe you meant to use '->' ?)
 5474 |   if ( ! yyin )
      |         ^~~~~
/mnt/resource/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-openfoam-org-7-przwv3ihfnjzn67pqj3t5b44ux6c6qao/OpenFOAM-7/platforms/linux64GccDPInt32RpathOpt/src/surfMesh/surf
aceFormats/stl/STLsurfaceFormatASCII.L.C:5477:10: error: request for member 'rdbuf' in '((STLASCIILexer*)this)->STLASCIILexer::<anonymous>.yyFlexLexer::yyo
ut', which is of pointer type 'std::ostream*' {aka 'std::basic_ostream<char>*'} (maybe you meant to use '->' ?)
 5477 |   if ( ! yyout )
```

### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-365-7b4354b
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ spack install openfoam-org
```

### Platform and user environment
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux ip-AC127405 3.10.0-1062.12.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Feb 4 23:02:59 UTC 2020 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information
```console
$ spack spec --install-status openfoam-org
------
 -   openfoam-org@7%gcc@9.2.0~float32~int64~metis patches=73103e6b1bdbf3b1e0d517cbbd11562e98c6e9464df5f43e5125e9a5b457d1c5,ecfa93afa8900f583a23c179db7cf0dc0
66828a9fd872e061164f21301c2a222 +source arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]      ^cmake@3.16.5%gcc@9.2.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]          ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@9.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]              ^pkgconf@1.6.3%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]          ^openssl@1.1.1e%gcc@9.2.0+systemcerts arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]              ^perl@5.30.1%gcc@9.2.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]                  ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-skylake

[+]      ^flex@2.6.4%gcc@9.2.0+lex patches=09c22e5c6fef327d3e48eb23f0d610dcd3a35ab9207f12e0f875701c677978d3 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]          ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]              ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@9.2.0 patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c
299f09828d793b853c8 +sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]                  ^libsigsegv@2.12%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]          ^automake@1.16.2%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-skylake

[+]              ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-skylake

[+]                      ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@9.2.0+shared arch=linux-centos7-skylake

d6c84aa60b12d106d47a2 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]              ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@9.2.0 arch=linux-centos7-skylake

0c13b064920f088f2ffe1 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]      ^openmpi@4.0.3%gcc@9.2.0~cuda+cxx_exceptions fabrics=none ~java~legacylaunchers~memchecker~pmi schedulers=none ~sqlite3~thread_multiple+vt arch=lin
ux-centos7-skylake
[+]      ^scotch@6.0.8%gcc@9.2.0+compression~esmumps~int64~metis+mpi+shared arch=linux-centos7-skylake
```

Also I would like to point out, that the build fails, but spack slip to the next `install` phase without giving any error.


Thanks
